Sector:
Foreven (Imperium Staple) 70 69

The Reidan, Urnian and Piah subsectors of this version of Foreven Sector were designed by Herb Petro and appeared in Imperium Staple, issues 6, 7 & 11, published by Gamesmasters Publications Association.

The Barbarian subsector of this version of Foreven Sector was designed by Martin Owen and appeared in Continuum, issue 2, published by Continuum Galactic Unlimited.

The systems in Heiligen and Harem appeared on the maps printed in Continuum issues 2 & 3, published by Continuum Galactic Unlimited, but were not otherwise detailed.

Data transcribed and edited by Graham Donald.
